data.title: Le Tigre White Poster
data.meta_description: A hand-drawn motif depicting a tiger on a beige background. On the tiger’s tail, there's a message in French. Manne is an artist based in Stockholm who has been engaged in illustration and painting since childhood. He went on to graduate with a degre..
data.text:
We believe that greater transparency will help lead the change towards a more sustainable future. As a step in this long-term commitment, we’re sharing how and where our products are made wherever possible.

Suppliers and factories for this product.

Location: Gothenburg, Sweden

Number of employees: 93 (19 women / 74 men)

Employees working hours daily: 8

Employees vacation days: 29

Certificates: FSC®, Climate Neutral Now, The Nordic Swan Ecolabel, ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015

Signed the Postery Code of Conduct: Yes

Visited by Postery: Yes

All our posters are printed in one of the leading printing factories in Northern Europe. The supplier has been family-owned since the start in 1963, and they share the same values we have at Postery, caring for generations to come. The supplier has the Nordic Swan Ecolabel, a label showing their commitment to reducing their environmental impact from the production to the consumption. Since 2011, the supplier has reduced its CO2 emissions by around 80%. The remaining emissions they cannot avoid are compensated financially to the United Nations initiative “Climate Neutral Now”. Hence, the factory has been 100% climate-neutral since 2011.

Delivery time to Switzerland is 4-6 business days. We aim to dispatch all orders within 24 business hours.

Shipping

We offer free shipping on orders over CHF 70. If your order total is less than this, shipping costs CHF 6.95. Once your order has left our warehouse, we’ll e-mail you a tracking link with the expected delivery date. During holiday seasons and other peaks affecting our warehouse, it may take us another day or so. Postery utilizes DHL Express for all deliveries to Switzerland.

Returns

We hope that you are pleased with your Postery order. If you would like a different product, size, or a refund, we accept exchanges and returns within 90 days. Please consider the environmental impact before returning your items.
